If you missed any part of our extraordinary hearing on #DCstatehood, tune in right now to 90.1 WCSP to listen in.  Hundreds of residents filled several rooms in Rayburn – so many residents attended that many gathered outside to watch the hearing on a big projection screen.

The 700,000 taxpaying residents in the District have met the qualifications for statehood.

1) they support democracy
2) they support becoming a state (by a large margin)
3) and the district has the resources to support itself

It's time for #DCstatehood.
